title: Sketchbook Folio, "Sarcophagus Figures, Study after the Antique", 1821–22
medium:
Pen and brown ink, brown wash, over black chalk
Support: white heavy wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left: 9 monumento antico Roma
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Above, drawing of end of sarcophagus with man and woman shaking hands; between them statue of goddess on plinth. Background shows drapery knotted at upper corners. Below, (probably) drawing of the two ends of sarcophagus, one with female figure, at left; and other, at right, male figure. Both with drapery backgrounds. Between them, a sketch of strigils with central medallion of head in profile.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Sarcophagus Figures, Study after the Antique", 1821–22.
1821–22. Pen and brown ink, brown wash, over black chalk
Support: white heavy wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3556-1.
